effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Grounds the target until it leaves battle.  Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effects.shortEffect: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.

moveDescription:
This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in
the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to
the ground.
